abstract: Egypt agrees to pay $140,000 to each family of Mexican tourists mistakenly killed by military helicopters.

headline.print_headline: Egypt Will Pay Three Families of Mexicans Killed in Error
headline.main: Egypt to Pay Families of 3 Mexican Tourists Killed by Military

snippet: They will receive $140,000 each, but officials admitted no guilt in the episode in which helicopters mistakenly fired on a group of picnickers, killing 12 in all.
lead_paragraph: They will receive $140,000 each, but officials admitted no guilt in the episode in which helicopters mistakenly fired on a group of picnickers, killing 12 in all.
